title: Why Every Home Needs A Rug + 30 Of Our Favourites To Shop!
description: Finding the right rug for a room is akin to placing the last piece of a puzzle. It helps anchor a space and tie all the furnishings together, and without one, it often feels like something is missing. Whether your home is minimalistic, coastal, playful or classic, browse the list below of the best rugs from our Design Directory, along with some helpful tips on how to style them.
author: The Design Files
